story.name: InitialPage.story
story.scenarios:
Scenario:Inserting a pacient in database Given the user is on the initial page Given the user is receptionist or doctor When the user click the insert pacient button Then they should see a form to enter the pacient data
Scenario:Looking up a pacient in database Given the user is on the initial page Given the user is receptionist or doctor When the user looks up a pacient name '$name' Then they should see the pacient data
